name: (H4) Authentic North End, ON Freedom Trail
neighborhood_overview: The North End, Boston’s Little Italy, is a maze of narrow streets with some of the city’s oldest buildings. On the self-guided Freedom Trail, tourists pass historic sites like the 1680 Paul Revere House and the Old North Church, which played a key role at the beginning of the Revolutionary War. Italian restaurants, coffeehouses, pastry shops and old-school delis pack the area, especially on lively Hanover Street.
description:
This is the perfect apartment for someone fascinated by the North End's history and action. Despite being in the middle of it all, you'll enjoy a quiet nights rest down our little side street.

The space
This apartment is in an amazing location! A block from Hanover Street! Right on the famous Freedom Trail! Surrounded by coffee shops, restaurants, laundromats. You are located down a quiet side street off of the North End action.

A charming, light filled and spacious one bedroom apartment right on the Freedom Trail and in the heart of the North End. It's only a short walk to all of downtown Boston. Lose yourself in Little Italy and feel Colonial history right at your doorstep. Fall asleep under the light of the Old North Church and wake up with your very own view of the 191 foot, historic steeple.

Please note, this unit has no kitchen. Luckily you are surrounded by the best food in the city of Boston!

Guest access
C
